intro.label: Product roadmap
intro.title: Where we're headed
intro.description: We’re building in phases, but the order is driven by a simple rule: the easiest things that are also essential ship first. That means trust, tier access, and safety come early, then content depth and discovery, then deeper community and stewardship.

phases.title: Early Beta: join, verify, and participate safely
phases.description: Make it easy to join and read, verify for trust, and gate participation by tier. Ship account states, reporting, and paid membership with enforced entitlements.

items.text: **Account states** — Active / suspended / banned with consistent enforcement (posting, messaging, uploads, and real-time connections).

**Identity verification (provider-agnostic)** — We submit verification requests to an external provider, trust the response, and store a simple status lifecycle (**pending → verified → revoked**) with timestamps and reason codes.
**Premium requires verified** — You can’t subscribe to (or keep) premium unless you’re verified. This is enforced in upgrade flow and in premium-only actions (member areas, media, etc.).

**Unverified read-only (plus private notes)** — Read public posts and longform, follow, bookmark, and manage profile basics; can create **Only me** private notes/drafts; no public posting, replies, or reactions.

**Verified participation limits** — React, post, and reply within limits (rate limits may be lower than Premium; configurable by admins); **text + links only** (no images/GIFs/video); men-only read areas; no dialogues; can reply to DMs started with them but cannot start new DMs.

**Premium baseline access** — Full posting and replies, member-only areas, can start DMs, and can post with media; Premium is baseline (unverified/verified may be slightly suppressed); paid tiers are neutral (no boosted reach).

**Stripe subscriptions** — Premium ($25/mo) and Premium+ ($75/mo) billing with verification gating; entitlements are enforced in the upgrade flow and settings. Premium+ is a supporter tier with no special power.
**Landing & onboarding** — Clear homepage and signup; smooth onboarding so you can post and follow in your first session.
**Discover / non-empty feed** — When you have zero follows, a “Discover” or “For you” feed (trending or recent public posts) so your home feed is never empty.
**Suggested users / who to follow** — Real “who to follow” (by interests or activity) so you fill your feed fast and see content that matters.

**Invite a friend** — Shareable signup or invite link (“Join me on Men of Hunger”) so you can bring friends and grow the circle. **Premium members:** when someone you invite verifies, they get **a free month of premium**.
**Push notifications** — Reply, follow, and boost notifications so you never miss a beat.

**Email re-engagement (v1 digest)** — A simple weekly digest and “you have new notifications” emails so you stay connected (provider: Mailgun or SES; we’ll pick the cheapest option that still delivers well).
**PWA / Add to home screen** — Install the app on your phone (icon, splash, offline where useful) for an app-like experience without the app store.
**Report post / Report user** — “Report” in the post menu and on profiles; pick a reason and add details; we store it and admins can triage. A fuller queue and resolution flow follows in April.
**Feedback** — Send us bugs and ideas; we store and triage so we can improve.
**Reliability** — Rate limits and clear “try again later” when needed; we test sign up → onboard → post → upgrade so the core flow works.
**Sentry** — Error tracking for both the API and the web app, so we catch regressions early and can respond fast.
**Third-party analytics (minimal)** — Track the key funnel events (join, verify submitted/approved, first post, follow, upgrade) so we can measure what’s working.

phases.badge: Phase 2 — A site that's full of life
phases.title: Discovery, content & polish
phases.description: Improve discovery and polish, but keep trust tight: SEO boundaries (robots, sitemap, canonical + share previews) and stronger reporting triage. Add post editing with limits and version history, drafts/autosave, and start integrations with webhooks. Subscription management and notification controls round it out.

items.text: Explore / trending with real data — Trending or popular posts and “who to follow” in Explore or the right rail, so discovery feels alive.
Hashtags & topics (v1) — Add hashtags to posts and simple topic pages so you can find and follow themes that matter to you.
**Edit post (with limits + history)** — You can edit up to **3 times in 30 minutes**; posts show an **edited** label; we keep previous versions so we can review changes.
**Drafts + autosave (posts)** — Save drafts automatically and resume across devices so you don’t lose work.
**Admin-only restore** — Restore soft-deleted posts (admin-only for now).
**Member experience (v1)** — No ads in member areas; paid tiers remain neutral (no boosted reach).
Manage subscription — Stripe customer portal (manage or cancel); optional annual plan or one-off support; Contact/Help in settings.
**Gift premium** — Pay for someone else’s subscription; send them a month (or more) of premium as a gift.
**Report queue** — Admin list with filters (post vs user, category) and resolution states (pending, dismissed, action taken).
Optional: we notify you when we’ve taken action (or you can check report status in-app), so you know we’re on it.
**Robots control** — Keep private/restricted surfaces out of search; environment-aware rules.
**Sitemap** — A sitemap for public profiles and public posts only; restricted tiers never appear.
**Canonical + share previews** — Canonical URLs everywhere; share previews never leak restricted content. Premium content also respects the rule: **premium requires verified**.
**Webhooks (v1)** — Signed, retrying webhooks for key events (user, identity, content, billing). Built to be reliable and idempotent.
Notification preferences — Choose what you get: mute replies, only chats, no boost notifications, etc.; per type or global.

phases.title: Groups, Chat, safety & data
phases.description: Ship deeper ways to connect (groups, dialogues, chat), strengthen safety controls, and add the first longform publishing path (articles). Add real-time post-thread updates so conversations feel alive. Keep compliance minimal but real (delete/export).

items.text: Groups (v1) — Create and join groups; group feed or group-scoped posts so you have pockets of accountability and conversation.
Dialogues (v1) — Start and participate in structured dialogues (premium required).
Chat — Real chats: list conversations, send and receive, mark read; only you and the other person see the thread.
**Articles (v1)** — A separate longform editor (rich text/markdown with safe rendering), drafts + autosave, publish/unpublish, and SEO-friendly public pages.
**Live thread updates** — Real-time updates under posts (new replies, edits, deletes/restores) so conversations feel active without refresh.
Block user — Block so they can’t see your posts, chat you, or appear in your feed; manage your block list in settings.
Mute user — “See less”; hide their posts in your feed without unfollowing.
Delete / deactivate account — “Delete my account” in settings; we soft-delete or fully erase and revoke sessions.
Download my data — Export your posts, profile, and bookmarks so you own your data.
Active sessions / devices — See where you’re logged in and revoke other sessions in settings.
PWA polish — If not fully done in March: installable, app-like experience on mobile (icon, splash, offline where useful).
Public status page or link so you can check uptime; in-app Help/Contact so you can reach us.

backlog.title: Later / backlog
backlog.description: Features we want but haven't slotted into a milestone yet.

items.text: Change phone number (add new number, verify, make primary).
Email as second factor or account recovery.
"Remember me" / longer sessions; list connected devices with revoke.
Read receipts (for chat) — off by default, toggleable if/when we add it.
Alt text for images (accessibility and screen readers).
Deeper topics — follow topics, trending topics, and topic moderation (spam/abuse resistance).
Share to Twitter/X or other apps.
Native iOS / Android — Native apps in the app stores so you get a first-class experience on your phone.
Deep linking (open a post or profile from a link in the app); app store optimization when native apps ship.
More email — per-event emails (e.g. “Email me when someone replies”), daily digests, and better deliverability tooling (suppression, bounces).
Webhook expansion — more event types, per-endpoint filters, replay tooling, and a small developer portal.
**Unified purchases** — One commerce flow that supports premium subscriptions plus one-off purchases (cosmetics/badges), refunds, and entitlements.
Subtle Steward badge (opt-in).
Stewards-only forum.
Founder updates and quarterly Steward calls (strategy, philosophy, Q&A).
Early access to new features / betas.
Priority support, faster moderation review (same outcomes), and priority account recovery.
Experience upgrades — no ads anywhere while logged in, better feed defaults, advanced mute / filter controls.
Higher limits — media size/quality, drafts, and extended edit windows.
Community tools — one private group, higher member caps, and event / RSVP tools.
**Purchasable customizations** — Themes, profile accents, or other app/profile customizations you can buy to personalize your experience.
**Profile badges** — Badges and achievements (e.g. early supporter, verified, streak, top contributor) that show on your profile and in the app.
**Simple games** — Lightweight games for logged-in users to play with one another (e.g. quick challenges or mini-games in-app).
Tip or support a creator — One-time payment to another member (optional).

footerDisclaimer: Dates are targets, not promises. We'll update this page as we lock in or shift milestones.
